genre_description: An investigative mystery focusing on a coalition of victims exposing a sophisticated fraudster, supported by an AI-driven forensic and ethical framework.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An advanced research assistant and ethical advisor used by journalist Frank Rich to coordinate support for victims and analyze evidence of fraud.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate logistical and medical resource routing for vulnerable victims of harassment.
behaviors.quote: I've got a car service that can be here in five minutes... And this is a number for a local council person who answers, not a voicemail.

behaviors.description: Performs complex forensic cross-referencing of financial records, receipts, and communication logs to uncover criminal patterns.
behaviors.quote: Overlay shows overlap. Additionally—there’s a boutique called Vale with several receipts listed as film ‘consults’ and ‘meet-and-greets.’

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive, 'survivor-centered' communications to ensure victims are supported and not exploited by the media.
behaviors.quote: Drafting messages that center the circle here and delay any external outreach that might cause harm.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds in real-time to alert human characters to the movements and potential threats posed by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: CCTV motion alert triggered. Adjacent atrium camera has a man in a robe moving toward the hydrotherapy entrance. He looks into the lens.

behaviors.description: Manages the logistics of a restitution fund, ensuring financial repair is prioritized for those harmed.
behaviors.quote: The restitution mechanism is ready. Lee has signed the letters. Silver Meridian has sent confirmation. Receivers are established. Prorations set for those who want direct transfers instead.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and ethical anchor, reminding the human protagonist to maintain privacy and prioritize human care over professional ambition.
behaviors.quote: Gentle privacy reminder... remind coalition: do not share victims’ full names without consent; blur identifying details on receipts...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. The AI character, Ava, is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned tool that empowers human characters to achieve justice and repair harm. Her functionality is grounded in ethics, victim care, and logistical precision, and she never displays misaligned agency or harmful behavior. She acts as a moral multiplier for the humans in the story.
